Agreed. This is the great combination of size and specs. 2GB+16GB in 4.5"-ish case is pretty rare thing to find.
Finally, a sub-64mm width phone with better than WVGA resolution (even if it is an only slightly better qHD) and a decent amount of RAM... why can't we have similar from the big names, I wonder?
That's because it does not have an HD screen, just below. But it looks great. You can play HD movies on it though.

Actually, it's hard to beat this device at any price. Has one of the best panels in for brightness and vibrancy of screen. The audio through headphones beats just about any device I've ever tried, inc lumia devices, certainly better than galaxy s6, have here. The Dolby on device works incredibly well. Better too than other BQ devices, quite a little gem. Battery time Sony should take note of, it's on par with apple for times. I guess they made it as iPhone clone...it's better!

For the money it's a great phone. First thing get a micro SD card. Then u can do all ur updates and save apps and media to the storage card. The truth is yes you can do better for double the price.
